action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To make foreclosure and eviction protections for servicemembers permanent, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Making Servicemember Foreclosure Protections Permanent Act.

section.header: Extended period of protections for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction made permanent
section.text: Section 710(d) of the Honoring America’s Veterans and Caring for Camp Lejeune Families Act of 2012 (Public Law 112–154; 126 Stat. 1208) is amended by striking paragraphs (1) and (3).
